projects.title: Coronavirus Live Tracker
projects.description: A live tracker for tracking covid cases and testing labs around users based on geolocation. Designed an algorithm to search locations using a combination of binary search and linear search. Employed fuzzy match on string data. Implemented an algorithm to find route between two districts with minimum number of cases. Designed fronted using HTML, CSS and MapboxAPI

projects.title: Affordable Digital Microscope (ML)
projects.description: Applied various clustering algorithms to improve the functioning of a digital microscope that helped in identifying different components of a blood smear to reduce the costs of medical tests for the poor and underprivileged people.

projects.title: Blockchain for certificate verification
projects.description: Developed a decentralised app (DApp) using etherum technology in blockchain to provide an alternative to paper based IDs to people.

projects.title: VisGraph C++
projects.description: Developed a Graphical User Interface (GUI) which allows the user to draw, delete and move vertices and edges of a graph and perform other required operations on it without having to understand the code. Implemented algorithms such as Blossoms algorithm, finding minimum vertex cover, finding an independent set, BFS, DFS etc. and automoted UMLs for the software.

projects.title: Deep Learning approach to conventional chlorophyll forecasting techniques
projects.description: Applied Deep learning methods on satellite data of chlorophyll concentrations in various regions of India to give better prediction techniques

honors_and_awards.title: Recipient of INSPIRE Scholarship
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded by the government of india to extremely meritorious students pursuing courses in Natural and Basic Sciences at B.Sc, BS or integrated M.Sc levels on achieving an all india rank under 10000 in the Joint Entrance Examination (JEE) - Advanced and having a min CGPA of 7/10 during their current semester.
